# jwt CLI

Install: `sudo apt install -y jwt`

Help: `jwt -h`

Decode a JWT string: 
```
echo eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICIxNWFTc3gwSmRMY3FtYzdnQm5nNWlFZWMzTW9mR25tQnc1elVXeWtxWjNnIn0..C0s6Wr9Aj2-R8jfBwHAizs5X_D48n4MIbHFn6AFvtnVn7NlXr6DObgNkEalXCXuvYJVN4iRm7FqQveJjx58v7RoLCEgYZpOPrjJuXZkN7xsHWG9Afu0w5-H1rDgga3ALAfLC_Pc-NE5UTEzS_4bBoiri_fp40OpP3WQL9iDBwpF2H7n5ipTm7Nmgf1C5rUfoPKhpNg33tcvsRY7bE7yuq8TvwnPaUq3QnVWdU6IK6iTnk-ukTtUyk7DKCTV5d09-BNyZgvengW_RvkfwMDonntbdG6ATrZQKMqkcCAROtohHU82U3Cs_TPYVyS3K3jvbo4OJDUm5ju1I-kv3ykY93A | jwt -show -
```
